column2:
"Gilnas is abnormally tough!
No matter how many times you
knock him down, he gets back up!"

"I guess it's not that hard to believe, what
with them being machines and all, but it's
still really creepy when you see it happen!"

"It's a real pain in the ass to have to keep
dealing with them over and over, so why
don't you go take 'em out for good?"

"Anyway, I'm counting on you! I'll be checking
the whole thing out on the monitor, and with
a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
